item.description:
Note the date change on this.  Depending on how many can attend this new date, we'll get our own private pool room at the Billiards Cafe in Ayer.  Our room will also have darts.  Depending on interest, we can meet for dinner at a low key restaurant beforehand at 6:00.

Rates for pool are $11.25 per hour per table, not per person.  So with 3-4 people at a table, it would be about $3.50 per person per hour.

Skill at pool or darts not required; however, landing the darts in the ceiling will be frowned upon :)  No dancing on the pool tables (except for Steve).

In the main room will be Open Mike that night, so if anyone wants to channel their inner Justin Bieber, we will certainly cheer you on.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: A Fun Night Out
